user.bio: Verveling?Luister anders naar de biervriendenpodcast voor een ongefilterde mening over speciaalbier.

items.badge_description: Round and round the wheel goes! Which style you’ll be drinking, nobody knows! Your desire to explore different styles is inspiring. Keep it up! That's a check-in to at least 165 different styles. Try 5 more for Level 34!

Everyone loves fresh beer, but obviously not as much as you do. You went straight to the source. 

That's a beer at 10 different venues categorized as a Brewery, Cidery or Meadery. Visit 5 more for Level 3!

Wine isn't the only beverage worthy of pairing with a delicious meal. With so many styles widely available, there’s a perfect pint for any cuisine of your choosing. That's a beer at 40 different venues categorized as a Restaurant. Try 5 more for Level 9!

Sometimes you need a break from all the hops, fruits, and spices. What better way than with a crisp, smooth Blonde Ale or Golden Ale? Basic but delicious. That's 20 different beers with the style of Blonde Ale or Golden Ale. Try 5 more for Level 5!

Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 75 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower. Try 5 more for Level 16!

Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 90 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 19!
Either you must be sampling or really like beer! That's 12 beers in 1 day.

Kiwis, rugby and sheep aren’t the only things New Zealand has to offer. There’s a ton of great beers in a variety of styles just waiting for you to explore! That's 15 different beers from a brewery in New Zealand. Try 5 more for Level 4.

beer.beer_name: Benny Hill Is Not Related To Hank
